sentences.english: The practice of YueFang ships seriously threatened the life safety of Chinese fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 越方船隻的做法嚴重威脅了中國漁民的生命安全。
漁民因此頭昏目眩而怨聲載道。

sentences.english: The Chinese Embassy has already sent a working group to visit them.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐日使領館已經派工作組探望了有關漁民。

sentences.english: The fisherman drew in the net.
China's maritime rescue teams will continue to help search and rescue Vietnamese victims and survivors.
sentences.chinese: 中國海上搜救部門將繼續幫助搜救越南遇險漁民。

sentences.english: Fish boats are the main tools of fishing for fisherman.
sentences.chinese: 漁船是漁民出海捕魚的主要工具。

sentences.english: As those who know fishermen well have often testified, they are gamblers and incurably optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 因爲了解漁民的人經常評論他們是強盜，治癒樂觀。

sentences.english: Fishery culture is among the most colorful in a fisherman daily life.
sentences.chinese: 漁民生活其中，漁業文化多采多姿。

sentences.english: Guo Caiai, fisherman said "I haven't gone fishing since spring festival.
sentences.chinese: 漁民郭彩愛說“春節過後我就沒有去捕魚。

sentences.english: Kashmiri fisherman rows his boat through autumn leaves in Kashmir's Dal Lake in Srinagar.
sentences.chinese: 一位克什米爾漁民撐船駛入秋天的斯里那加戴爾湖。

sentences.english: It trains fishermen who usually earn a living fishing in the ocean to be fish farmers.
sentences.chinese: 列車漁民的收入一般在海洋捕魚爲生的養魚戶。

sentences.english: Philippine authorities have frequently detained Chinese fishermen near Palawan.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓當局經常在巴拉望省附近拘留中國漁民。

sentences.english: The news stunned friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 漁民生還的消息讓他們的朋友和親戚驚得目瞪口呆。

sentences.english: We went down to Siwan beach. There were many fishermen's huts and little hoses built on disused sampans.
sentences.chinese: 我們走進西灣海灘，那裏有用廢船建造的漁民小屋。

sentences.english: Barbary whistled a Ronssllon fisherman 's song .
sentences.chinese: 巴伯裏用口哨吹一支羅士蘭漁民歌曲。

sentences.english: Fishermen moor their boats at a seasonal camp at the western end of the park.
sentences.chinese: 在公園西端，漁民們把船停泊在一個季節性營地。

definition: opposite bank (of a body of water)
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
